article_title: The 10 Richest Members of Congress in 2014
article_text:
Rep. Darrell Issa (R-CA)

Net Worth: $357 million

The House Oversight and Government Reform Committee chairman tops the list for the second consecutive year, thanks to the fortune he amassed manufacturing car alarms.
